originalText.text: Since I've been working out with Coach E for almost 5 years, I highly endorse both he and his team.  His workouts are constantly varied and keep you on your toes.  From weighted lunges around the block to different types of indoor strength training, each varied workout challenges you to the max.  Coach E, in his own words, "I don't want the people I train to ask themselves if they worked out that morning - they will feel it"

originalText.text: I’ve been working with Coach E and the re-Creation fitness team since 2019. Indoor, outdoor, private, boxing, team coaching - each experience has been curated to my personal fitness needs and goals. I’m a physician with an erratic schedule. Coach E is incredibly creative with scheduling and the class offerings means I always have an option. I recently started training for a half marathon and I’m blown away at how easy it’s been - I credit the foundational conditioning built under the guidance of Coach E and the re-Creation team. The team keeps our sessions safe, relaxed, fun…and always with the best background tunes. I couldn’t recommend this gym more!

originalText.text:
Intimidating at first glance and to the uninitiated, this fitness studio is dedicated to developing your body; so it can serve you in the best possible way.

Coach E and his staff will work with you in an individual, group and/or class setting to aid you in your fitness goals. Don’t expect countless reps on machines- in fact, expect ever-changing workouts designed not only to build strength and aid in fat loss but to improve your posture, balance while increasing your endurance.

Fitness sessions will take place inside and outside the studio, depending on the weather. You may find yourself doing deadlifts and shoulder presses inside, while striking a huge tire with the sledgehammer or weighted ball slams or weighted lunges up and down the block!

I enjoy my workouts- though they appear daunting at the start of the session. Coach E is determined to see you push beyond your perceived limits, while maintaining the proper form and techniques that have been taught to you. I tell folk that sometimes it’s like “Rocky IV” when I train there but my improved strength levels, posture and endurance speak for themselves. You will see results as well as the method behind the madness.

Give it a try. If sample classes or promos are offered, take advantage so you can see for yourself. You won’t regret the experience!

originalText.text: Coach E is the best trainer in NYC. He tailors programs to your fitness goals that combine strength, mobility, and recovery. Each workout is carefully crafted to target your body in specific way. I have been training with Coach for over ten years and have never met a trainer who even comes close to his level. He trains all levels from beginners to athletes.

originalText.text:
Re-Creation fitness is truly the best spot in Harlem to workout. After a long break from the gym during covid I tried a few gyms but found myself avoiding getting to the gym. I had walked by Re-Creation a few times so I figured I would check it out and I have never looked back. I've been going to the gym for the past few months and it really does have a great neighborhood vibe that makes working out enjoyable.

Coach E and his team work with you to develop custom workouts for whatever your fitness goals may be. I always leave sweaty and smiling after being pushed through my workouts and I have seen noticeable changes to my fitness. The Re-Creation team has helped me re-ignite my fitness journey and I would highly recommend anyone who is looking for a new place to work out to check out Re-Creation Fitness.
